Class SingleChildParent

dev.gamekit.ui.widgets.SingleChildParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Align, Button, Compose, Opacity, Padding, Panel, Scaled, Sized
public abstract class SingleChildParent extends Parent
A parent which contains only one child Widget
